about_the_game:
"Secret Paws - Cozy Offices: Expansion Pack" is an expansion for the base game "Secret Paws – Cozy Offices", introducing new cats to find and challenges to unravel.

Get ready to explore even more cozy offices with this incredible expansion for Secret Paws - Cozy Offices! The DLC adds 6 new levels, bringing almost 500 new cats to discover. These even more detailed and challenging environments will put your detective skills to the test as you uncover even more ingenious hiding spots.

  • 6 new cozy offices: Explore new locations filled with charm and unique details. 🙀

  • Nearly 500 new hidden cats: From mischievous kittens to majestic adult cats, each has its unique personality and hiding spot. 🐾

  • More ingenious hiding spots: Challenge your skills by searching for cats in even more unexpected places! 📦

Don't miss the chance to expand your adventure and discover where all these adorable cats are hiding! The expansion is waiting for you – who knows how many secrets are hidden in these new offices? 😻

name: Secret Paws - Cozy Offices: Expansion Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • VR Support: No VR Support
  • Additional Notes: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No VR Support
  • Additional Notes: None

short_description: Find hidden cats in a detailed isometric 3D environment. Interact with windows, open drawers, cabinets, and move objects to uncover the most surprising hiding spots. Discover cats in places you never imagined!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
